actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the impact of State and local property taxes on the utilization of solar energy equipment.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that States and local governments should amend property tax laws so that expenditures for solar heating and cooling equipment would not result in increased property taxes.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the impact of State and local property taxes on the utilization of solar energy equipment.
